feat.value: He went once, that is the presbyter of Scetis, to the archbishop of Alexandria
and after he returned to Scetis, they asked him, that is the brothers, about news from the city.
But he told them: 'Naturally, my brothers, I have not seen the face of any man, except the archbishop alone.'
After hearing him they became strengthened thanks to his story, that they should guard themselves against raising their eyes.
